hooks.name: format-on-edit
hooks.description: Run dotnet format on edited C# files

hooks.name: build-check-on-edit
hooks.description: Run dotnet build after C# edits
hooks.command: cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && dotnet build --no-restore 2>&1 | grep -E 'error CS' | head -10 || true

hooks.name: pre-commit-quality-gate
hooks.description: Full quality check before git commits
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && dotnet format --verify-no-changes && dotnet build && dotnet test; fi
